reference.text: radiation analysis of materials, mass spectrometry G01N; counters per se G06M, H03K; electric discharge tubes for analysing radiation or particles H01J40/00 , H01J47/00 , H01J49/00

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers the measurement of X-radiation, gamma radiation, corpuscular radiation, cosmic radiation or neutron radiation.
Attention is drawn to the Notes following the title of class G01.

title-part.text: Measuring X-radiation, gamma radiation, corpuscular radiation, or cosmic radiation

reference.text: G01T1/15 takes precedence, measuring exposure time to X-rays H05G1/28

CPC-specific-text.text: using colour change; including plastic dosimeters

title-part.text: Instruments in which pulses generated by a radiation detector are integrated, e.g. by a diode pump circuit

reference.text: pulse rate meters in general G01R23/02

with a combination of at least two different types of detector
with other specified detectors not provided for in the other sub-groups of G01T1/16

using an array of optically separate scintillation elements permitting direct location of scintillations

title-part.text: involving relative movement between detector and subject

CPC-specific-text.text: scanners in general without using scintigraphy G01T1/2964
Processing methods of scan data, e.g. involving contrast enhancement, background reduction, smoothing, motion correction, dual radio-isotope scanning, computer processing
